characters.story: "GING!" the bell commands sharply on the trail path - a shortcut through the queue.
"Gee!" she sings cheerfully, splashing in the creek where water vultures and St. Bernards play.
"YOU!" the young child commands sharply, immature but bossy.
"Yo!" he sings cheerfully from the secluded, quiet remote hiding spot.
"Gee!" she sings cheerfully, though wet from water and sun - the dehumidifier fights two cocoons of moisture.
"You want mysteries?" he questions curiously about the profound enigmatic secrets.
"CHEW!" the livestock commands sharply - the animals and cattle are hungry.
"SHOOT for savings!" she commands sharply, using flower power to save up with the livestock.
"Chain 'em!" he sings cheerfully, leading the animals along, pulling them by involvement.
"You want tension?" she questions curiously, pulling the mysterious bow string tight.
"See?" he questions curiously as magnetism creates attraction and pull.
"Gee!" she sings cheerfully, water nourishing and enriching growth.
"See?" the kindhearted woman questions curiously, showing mercy and compassion.
"Gee!" he sings cheerfully while mocking words of scorn and ridicule.
"SHOCK!" she commands sharply as fire and music create luminous, bright sparkling light.
"SHUN!" he commands sharply, being modest and humble about his inferior skills.
"SHARE the load!" she commands sharply, removing and discharging cargo.
"YOU!" the imperial emperor commands sharply, controlling the royal queue to unload.
